query:
ALTER TABLE pmItems 
ADD COLUMN roadmapPosition INT,
ADD COLUMN roadmapStatus ENUM('not-started', 'queued', 'in-progress', 'complete') DEFAULT 'not-started',
ADD COLUMN estimatedHours DOUBLE,
ADD COLUMN estimatedCost DOUBLE,
ADD COLUMN backendImpact JSON,
ADD COLUMN frontendImpact JSON,
ADD COLUMN databaseImpact JSON,
ADD COLUMN dependsOn JSON,
ADD COLUMN blocks JSON,
ADD COLUMN affectedBy JSON

ADD COLUMN roadmapStatus ENUM('not-started', 'queued', 'in-progress', 'complete') DEFAULT 'not-started',
ADD COLUMN estimatedHours DOUBLE,
ADD COLUMN estimatedCost DOUBLE,
ADD COLUMN backendImpact JSON,
ADD COLUMN frontendImpact JSON,
